thread.title: Donald Trump on Celebrity Apprentice: 'NBC would dump Arnold Schwarzenegger if I'd return' - The Celebrity Apprentice USA Reality TV -
thread.title_full: Donald Trump on Celebrity Apprentice: 'NBC would dump Arnold Schwarzenegger if I'd return' - The Celebrity Apprentice USA News - Reality TV - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Donald Trump on Celebrity Apprentice: 'NBC would dump Arnold Schwarzenegger if I'd return' - The Celebrity Apprentice USA Reality TV -
text: Presidential hopeful Donald Trump seems just a tad bitter over Arnold Schwarzenegger replacing him as host of The Celebrity Apprentice/Schwarzenegger was announced as Trump's replacement on the reality show over the summer, following NBC cutting its ties with Trump. © NBC Universal / Patrick Randak You're terminated! You WON'T be back! Twitter gives Arnie a hand with his Celebrity Apprentice catchphraseSpeaking on Fox & Friends today, Trump insisted that NBC "didn't dump [him]" over his controversial remarks about Mexicans on the presidential campaign trail."They would take me right now, and they would get rid of Arnold Schwarzenegger if I wanted to do [The Celebrity Apprentice]," Trump insisted.He went on to give Schwarzenegger his best: "I hope he's going to do well!"NBC announced in June that it would no longer work with Trump in the aftermath of the Republican candidate accusing Mexico of sending "rapists" across the US border. © Getty Images / Mark Metcalfe for Paramount Pictures International In spite of the bad blood between the network and Trump, the candidate has been invited to host the next new edition of Saturday Night Live.Meanwhile, NBC has scheduled the return of The Celebrity Apprentice for the 2016-17 television season.
